title: What will be the greatest technological advances in the next 300 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: 300 years from now? Well, be glad You and I won’t be alive by then. I say this because of the answer I’ll give. These are my thoughts. Let me introduce you to Sophia:  Hey! Before I continue, I want you to meet the first Robot citizen of Saudi Arabia. What does that say to you? Couldn’t she be the height of technology as we know it? Making her a citizen makes me think about the motive behind AI and the direction technology is going. The world is advancing to where technology will become autonomous. Which means humans are not required anymore. Almost like we are being replaced, right? What if that’s the case? Autonomous vehicles, machines, etc.. You will agree with me that 300 years from now is more than enough to perfect Artificial Intelligence. Oh…are you hoping I will tell you about IoT The World’s First Artificial Intelligence robot citizen “Sophia” may be a kind of ‘Adam’ for the robot generation. You should watch the video on the interview and tell me if that doesn’t creep you out. She mentioned couple of times during her interviews with the word, “World Domination.” People laughed.  Also, with the advancement in technology, comes with a lot of negative effects as well. If I should guess what 300 years from now will be, I’m sorry, but all I can picture is ‘The Terminator” Movie. Artificial Intelligence will be perfected by 300 years from now, with robots being able to detect that humans are killing their planet (Maybe). I should also mention that AI perfection will be the greatest technological achievement. That is where AI can not only think for itself, but also able to execute those thoughts. And they will also become autonomous to even write codes to create other robots. Humanity might become extinct just like Dinosaurs (Don’t worry, I don’t believe that, but movies……. I guess I can make any prediction.) You and I won’t be alive by then to see it.   I’ve watched movies about how robots turned on humans. But now I feel these movies are trying to pass a message. Watch the movies Ex Machina - Ava In conclusion, If you ask about technology in 5 to 30 years from now, I might mention some gadgets and stuff… but 300 years from now, this is what you get.

Perhaps beyond our technological comprehension because by 2320, it would be a Star Trekian type of advancement with perhaps a “beam me up, Scotty” type of physical teleportation, and Star Wars type of propulsion systems to traverse the wormholes, nano-bots introduced into our bloodstream to eliminate each and every blood and vascular disease, especially by consuming the arterial plaque in our circulatory system and is evacuated through our bowels as waste, maybe we can finally achieve the full potential of solar radiation on our planet with storage capacity of the wattage energy for years, longevity can/will increase maybe to the biblical 120 years old while feeling like a 35 year old, maybe we can achieve the speed of light travel by converting our bodies into light and retain zero mass while we can re-materialize our bodies at our destination. Sounds far-fetched ? Just stay up on the night December 31, 2319 and celebrate the above.

Impossible to know, but I’d expect them to include: O’Neill spaceworlds, which will literally open the skies to the creation of delightful homes and playgroundsThe space elevator, which will make going to and from space easy and cheapSolar power satellites, a clean and effectively unlimited source of energyNuclear fusion, another such sourceAsteroid and Lunar mining, which will end terrestrial mining and resource extraction at scale, thereby improving Earth’s environmentFully flowered quantum computing, which will reveal the full power of computers and probably enable superhuman AIsSystems for reversing climate change; for example, throttleable geoengineering—which can be turned down or off if nasty side effects appear

in ca 5 years a new kind of “unlimited economy” will be invented, where you can print all the money you want without inflation, which will give rise to mega projects and lift 2nd and 3rd worlds to 1st, where they now can afford extremely expensive recycling, expensive hospital equipment, have full staff so they don’t get stressed, etc etcarchitecture will be spectacular with skyroads and skyparks, Buildings will have forms out of this worldquantum internet gives negative ping timesspintronics will shrink electronics, you can stack microchips fulfilling Moore’s Law, since they use very little power and thereby almost generates no heat“The Singularity” in ca 12 - 15 years AI will become self aware, and soon after exceed human average intellect, then some decades after be on genius lvl of ca 150, maybe in 100 years be 250superior AI will help humans with guidance, being lawyers, sages, consultants, cooks, workers, maids, friends, etc etcspace elevator will come in ca 40 years, greatly reducing cost of putting satellites up in space, space tourism will explodequantum computers only government can use it to crack codes, and limited use by big businesssuper highways and rail tracks will be made to encompass the world, that are ca 7 m above ground, so wild life doesn’t get bothered by traffican entirely new kind of “pendulum energy form” will come and replace almost everything. It’s 100% clean and green, save mining the metals used for it.No flying cars, sorry!

The expansion of Energy capabilities, even past Fusion power, where controlled chain reactions in altering the make-up of atoms’ protons, electrons, even nuclei to alter and transmute elements.We already do it with the transuranic elements, like breeding plutonium from uranium, or uranium from thorium. That kind of transmutation is relatively simple, something we have been doing for decades.The concept of the Alchemist changing lead into gold is still far from achievable. Where it can possibly go is an atomic level 3D printing of solid objects and articles, like in the episodes of Star Trek. at that point, we will have arrived in the Post-Scarcity Age of human existence.

Uploading human intelligence and personalities to computers, Regular uploads and you wouldn’t have to worry as much about accidents Rebuilding our bodies as biological or android, or a combination. Think of the possibilities you could stay here and go exploring the universe.
